content: <rdf:RDF xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">   <dcat:Dataset rdf:about="http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/civil-rights-data-collection-201112">     <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="urn:uuid:3e667a89-0ae9-4dbd-9872-47ee3e5bf3d8"></owl:sameAs>     <dct:description>The Civil Rights Data Collection, 2011\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd12 (CRDC 2011\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd12) is part of the Civil Rights Data Collection (CRDC) program. CRDC 2011\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd12 (http://ocrdata.ed.gov/) is a cross-sectional survey that collects data on key education and civil rights issues in the nation's public schools, which include student enrollment and educational programs and services, disaggregated by race/ethnicity, sex, limited English proficiency, and disability. LEAs submit administrative records about schools in the district. CRDC 2011\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd12 is a universe survey. Key statistics produced from CRDC 2011\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd12 can provide information about critical civil rights issues as well as contextual information on the state of civil rights in the nation, including enrollment demographics, advanced placement, discipline, and special education services.</dct:description>         <dcat:keyword>advanced-placement</dcat:keyword>
